channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- protobuf-java
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- protobuf-java

item.title: CVE-2021-22569|2024-08-03T18:44:14.144Z -- google%20llc -- protobuf-java
item.description: An issue in protobuf-java allowed the interleaving of com.google.protobuf.UnknownFieldSet fields in such a way that would be processed out of order. A small malicious payload can occupy the parser for several minutes by creating large numbers of short-lived objects that cause frequent, repeated pauses. We recommend upgrading libraries beyond the vulnerable versions.
